price: 1 Béni soit Celui qui a révélé à Son serviteur le Livre permettant de discerner le vrai du faux afin qu’il avertisse l’humanité,
arabic: تَبَارَكَ ٱلَّذِي نَزَّلَ ٱلۡفُرۡقَانَ عَلَىٰ عَبۡدِهِۦ لِيَكُونَ لِلۡعَٰلَمِينَ نَذِيرًا

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: tabāraka alladhī nazzala al-fur'qāna ʿalā ʿabdihi liyakūna lil'ʿālamīna nadhīran
